<h3 id="X12699">X(12699)&nbsp;=&nbsp;ORTHOLOGIC CENTER OF THESE TRIANGLES: JOHNSON TO 3rd EXTOUCH</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; a^4+(b+c)*a^3-2*b*c*a^2-(b^2-c^2)*(b-c)*a-(b^2-c^2)^2  :  :
<br>
<b>
X(12699) = 4*X(1)-3*X(3655) = 2*X(1)-3*X(3656) = 3*X(3)-4*X(1125) = 2*X(3)-3*X(5886) = 5*X(3)-6*X(10165) = 5*X(3)-4*X(12512) = 3*X(4) - X(8) = 3*X(946)-2*X(1125) = 4*X(946)-3*X(5886) = 5*X(946)-3*X(10165) = X(6361)-4*X(9955)
</b>
<p>
The reciprocal orthologic center of these triangles is X(4).</p>
<p>X(12699) lies on these lines: {1,30}, {2,3579}, {3,142}, {4,8}, {5,40}, {7,1058}, {10,381}, {11,46}, {12,5119}, {19,7359}, {20,1385}, {35,11375}, {36,11376}, {52,2807}, {55,6985}, {56,1770}, <p>
X(12699) = midpoint of X(i) and X(j) for these {i,j}: {4,962}, {40,9589}, {382,1482}, {944,3146}, {1320,10728}, {2102,10737}, {2103,10736}, {5691,7982}, {5812,12700}, {5881,11531}, {7970,10723}, {7978,10733}, {7983,10722}, {7984,10721}, {10695,10727}, {10696,10732}, {10697,10725}, {10698,10724}, {10703,10726}<br>
X(12699) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (3,946), (20,1385), (40,5), (74,12261), (100,12611), (145,11278), (355,4), (550,5901), (1482,4301), (1657,4297), (1768,1484), (3359,7956), (3416,3818), (3534,551), (3579,9955), (3654,381), (3655,3656), (3679,3845), (5493,6684), (5541,11698), (5690,546), (5691,3627), (5887,9856), (6265,1537), (6361,3579), (6769,5763), (7991,5690), (8725,12264), (9778,11230), (9821,12263), (9904,10264), (11500,12608), (12121,11720), (12163,12259), (12188,11599), (12368,1539), (12383,11699), (12515,11), (12702,10), (12778,113)<br>
X(12699) = isogonal conjugate of X(10623)<br>
X(12699) = anticomplement of X(3579)<br>
X(12699) = complement of X(6361)<br>
X(12699) = X(40)-of-Johnson-triangle<br>
X(12699) = homothetic center of Ehrmann mid-triangle and outer Garcia triangle<br>
X(12699) = X(12702)-of-Ehrmann-mid-triangle<br>
X(12699) = X(12702)-of-outer-Garcia-triangle<br>
X(12699) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (1,79,10404), (2,6361,3579), (3,946,5886), (4,5758,5777), (7,1058,5045), (10,12702,3654), (20,5603,1385), (40,1699,5), (55,12047,11374), (57,9614,496), (381,12702,10), (962,9812,4), (962,10248,12245), (1699,9589,40), (1836,10404,79), (1836,12701,1), (3058,3649,1), (3434,11415,72), (3579,9955,2), (10165,12512,3)<br>
</p>
